name: signal
description: A friendly music sequencer application for OS X and Windows.

scripts.firebase: npm --prefix functions run build && firebase emulators:start
scripts.dev:electron: concurrently "npm run dev -w app" "npm run dev --prefix electron"
scripts.build:electron: npm run build:electron -w app && rimraf electron/dist_renderer && cpx "app/dist/**/*" electron/dist_renderer
scripts.package:electron:darwin: npm run build:electron && npm run package:darwin --prefix electron
scripts.package:electron: npm run build:electron && npm run package --prefix electron
scripts.make:electron: npm run build:electron && npm run make:mas --prefix electron
scripts.make:darwin: npm run build:electron && npm run make:darwin --prefix electron
scripts.make:win: npm run build:electron && npm run make:win --prefix electron

author: ryohey
